body_html:
@dandelionmane

(We're working on getting pip install tensorboard to work too.)

It seems tensorboard is used by https://github.com/dmlc/tensorboard.
Is there a plan to provide a tf independent package which can be used by other ML frameworks?

It seems tensorboard is used by https://github.com/dmlc/tensorboard.
Is there a plan to provide a tf independent package which can be used by other ML frameworks?
